original_text: For there were about five thousand men. And he said to his disciples, “Have them sit down in groups of about fifty each.”
korean_text: 이는 남자가 한 오천 명 됨이러라 제자들에게 이르시되 떼를 지어 한 오십 명씩 앉히라 하시니

sentences.original_text: For there were about five thousand men.
sentences.korean_translation: 거기에는 남자가 약 오천 명이 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: And he said to his disciples,
in groups of about fifty each.”
